      • configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile

        public void configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile(String loggingConfigurationFileName,
                                        String loggingLevel,
                                        ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger activeLogger)
        Description copied from interface: LoggingHelper
        Create a logger from the specified configuration file name with the specified logging level as an override. Use the specified logger to log any error messages
        Specified by:
        configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile in interface LoggingHelper
        activeLogger - logger to use for logging until logging is configured for the specified logger. Null indicates no override

      • configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile

        public void configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile(String loggingConfigurationFileName,
                                        String loggingLevel,
                                        ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger activeLogger,
                                        Class classContext)
        Description copied from interface: LoggingHelper
        Create a logger from the specified configuration file name with the specified logging level as an override. Use the specified logger to log any error messages. Specify the class context.
        Specified by:
        configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile in interface LoggingHelper
        activeLogger - logger to use for logging until logging is configured for the specified logger. Null indicates no override
        classContext - Specify class for resource loading. If null, loading is relative to LoggingHelper class instance
